DOC.brief_summary: A pilot study to observe satisfaction of analgesia with intercostal catheters after VATS lobectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Inter Costal Catheters for Video-Assisted Thoroscopic (VATS) Lobectomy
DOC.detailed_description: Pain and satisfaction with pain treatment is investigated in a population after VATS lobectomy.
